jump_scares.spoiler: The Prowler appears behind Rosemary and Roy, impaling them
While walking backwards, Pam bumps into Mark
Carl opens that shower door, startling Sherry
The Prowler grabs Carls neck, and stabs him in the head
Accompanied by sound effect, Pam sees the the Prowler
A few sightings of the Prowler over the next 40 seconds, might startle some viewers (with sound effect)
While running, a Chatman grabs Pam’s arm
Pam runs into Mark
The camera suddenly shifts over on the Prowler
Once again, camera suddenly shifts over on the Prowler
While swimming, the Prowler appears in front of Lisa
In the pool, the Prowler jumps up behind Lisa, killing her
The Prowler (hiding in a tree) grabs Allison (while running), and stabs her
Chatham appears outside the car window, Scaring Pam
Mark opens a coffin, revealing Lisa’s Body
The camera abruptly shifts over on the Prowler, taking a knife out of the pocket
The lamp turns off
The Prowler appears behind Mark
The lights in the living room turn on (with sound effect)
A corpse falls down inside the fireplace
Prowler appears in front of the camera, holding a rose
Seemingly dead, The Prowler leaps up, and shoots Otto
In the shower, Carl’s arm lashes out at Pam, grabbing her
